creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: large cream-colored central block, edged in red; one large black central medallion with birds and flower shape in cream, yellow and red; four flower medallions surround central medallion; black border with dancing figures, flowers and birds; partially edged in gold metallic trim with magenta, orange and green details
title: Woman's festival head covering
